org.apache.hama.bsp.sync

Class ZKSyncBSPMasterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.sync.ZKSyncClient
      • org.apache.hama.bsp.sync.ZKSyncBSPMasterClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MasterSyncClient, SyncClient, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class ZKSyncBSPMasterClient
extends ZKSyncClient
implements MasterSyncClient
    Zookeeper sunchronization client that is used by BSPMaster to maintain global state of cluster.
